name: Linkedin++
description: Improves on the styling behind the new LinkedIn - Eliminating a few minor issues with the interface.
additional_info:
Updates:
1.4 (23/06/13)
> Adjusted header colors to match page redesign

1.3 (13/02/13)
> Fixed missing 'Account' link on Settings page.

1.2 (24/01/13)
> Fixed incorrectly displaying profile picture next to "Share an Update."

1.1 (02/12/12)
> Now appearing 'LinkedIn Today' box has been removed.
> Adjusted header color to make notifications more visible.
> Removed 'Add Connections' on header. Note: This can still be accessed from 'Contacts > Add Connections'

1.0 (04/11/12)
> Adjusted header link colors from blue to white.
> Margin applied to the display pictures next to the updates page.
> Adjusted header background colors.
